alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 7:24AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Buffalo and southwestern Sherman Counties through 800 AM CDT... At 724 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mason City, or 26 miles southeast of Broken Bow, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Litchfield around 730 AM CDT. Hazard around 740 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Pleasanton, Ravenna and Poole. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
